title: Emotional Detox Blend
author: Alyson
description: Woolzies Emotional Detox Oil Blend is an energizing oil with a citrusy herbal aroma that can recharge the mind and body. It contains oils of Frankincense, Clary Sage, Lemon, Neroli, Patchouli, Vanilla, Rose, & Sandalwood.
